subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: John Calipari’s up-tempo style of play is appealing at a time when our dribbling adolescents are more than ever in the clutches of the undisciplined (to put it diplomatically) A.A.U. culture.
snippet: John Calipari’s up-tempo style of play is appealing at a time when our dribbling adolescents are more than ever in the clutches of the undisciplined (to put it diplomatically) A.A.U. culture.
